name: Liquid Billiards
description:
A puzzle game where you use physics to combine coloured balls and move them toward the goal. Developed by a single person in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2021. Can be controlled using a mouse or gamepad.

Controls:
Aim: Mouse or left analog stick
Launch: Left mouse button or A on the gamepad
Alter power: Q/E or d-pad left/right
Rotate camera: A/D or the right analog stick
Retry: R or Y on the gamepad
Toggle HUD on/off: H
Return to main menu: Escape or Pause on the gamepad
